14#pragma once
15
16#include <stdlib.h>
17
18#include <isc/lang.h>
19
20/*! \file isc/entropy_private.h
21 * \brief Implements wrapper around CSPRNG cryptographic library calls
22 * for getting cryptographically secure pseudo-random numbers.
23 *
24 * - If OpenSSL is used, it uses RAND_bytes()
25 * - If PKCS#11 is used, it uses pkcs_C_GenerateRandom()
26 *
27 */
28
29ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
30
31void
32isc_entropy_get(void *buf, size_t buflen);
33/*!<
34 * \brief Get cryptographically-secure pseudo-random data.
35 */
36
37ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
38
